vectorientation.configuration.title: Vectorientation Configuration
vectorientation.configuration.warpFactor: Defines the amount squish increases with velocity
vectorientation.configuration.squetch.to: Whether Squash & Stretch should be enabled
vectorientation.configuration.minWarp.to: Defines the vertical squish at 0 velocity
vectorientation.configuration.blocks.too: A list of blocks that should not be squished.
